explains: n. 情况介绍会；简报；详细指示，详情介绍
v. 给……指示，向……介绍情况（brief 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: press briefing 新闻发布会；记者招待会；新闻简报会

sentences.en: They're holding a press briefing tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他们明天将召开新闻发布会。

sentences.en: The president received a briefing by telegram.
sentences.cn: 总裁收到了一份电报简报。

sentences.en: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯和我在他的书房里私下开简报会。
